headline: Mantle Ridge Releases Video Series Introducing Shareholder Nominees and Outlining Solutions for Challenges and Underperformance at Air Products and Chemicals, Inc.
summary: Mantle Ridge LP, which, together with its affiliates (collectively, "Mantle Ridge"), beneficially owns approximately $1.3 billion of the outstanding common shares of Air Products and Chemicals, Inc. (NYSE: APD) ("Air Products" or the "Company"), today released a series of video interviews with its four director candidates seeking election to Air Products' Board of Directors (the "Board") at the Company's 2025 Annual Meeting of Shareholders (the "Annual Meeting"), as well as with its proposed CEO

raw.headline: Mantle Ridge Releases Video Series Introducing Shareholder Nominees and Outlining Solutions for Challenges and Underperformance at Air Products and Chemicals, Inc.
raw.summary: Mantle Ridge LP, which, together with its affiliates (collectively, "Mantle Ridge"), beneficially owns approximately $1.3 billion of the outstanding common shares of Air Products and Chemicals, Inc. (NYSE: APD) ("Air Products" or the "Company"), today released a series of video interviews with its four director candidates seeking election to Air Products' Board of Directors (the "Board") at the Company's 2025 Annual Meeting of Shareholders (the "Annual Meeting"), as well as with its proposed CEO
